text: 11.2: Ese 40.17-20; Dan 8.10; Ru 21.24; VB 12.6; 13.5Ndu kha Fhe Bakɨme phena bɨngi bɨna vhen kɨrar, mbe phogi ga vhuav kav, buni nzuai ŋanen panɨ thari. Ne khaŋ muuŋgi, mba ŋaneŋ, ne harigi fhaiŋ ŋgui gumgi gu mbigi zav, phogi ga vhui ŋaneŋ ma. Mba gumgi gu mbigi, mbe zɨv, Fhe Bakɨme ŋgu bakɨme, Zerusarem, thiphogɨp kɨrim, 42 kɨni vhɨzgirga.11.2 42 kɨni nta 1,260 rarira fara muuŋgi, o, mpari mpuveni khegntɨrive fɨgeŋ phorga. Ndu Danier 7.25 ganɨv, vhɨra 9.27 ganɨv, 12.7 ganɨri. Mba harigi gumgi Zerusarem thiphogi kameŋ, ndu Ruk 21.24 ganɨri.
